This is a sample text file for testing the ingestor system.

It contains multiple paragraphs to test the chunking functionality.

This paragraph tests paragraph-based chunking.

The ingestor system should be able to process this file and extract meaningful information.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec auctor, felis eget ultricies lacinia, 
nunc nisl aliquam nisi, eget aliquam nisl nunc vel nisl. Donec auctor, felis eget ultricies lacinia,
nunc nisl aliquam nisi, eget aliquam nisl nunc vel nisl.
